KitKat::

She convulsed and contorted in pain. Her stomach was swelling. A line 
was leaking internally and it had to be repaired. She groaned and 
cried in her suffering. She whimpered in a hushed, yet strained 
voice. "Somebot...help....me....pain...can't..take...AHHHHH!" She 
threw her head back and screamed.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> The Maximal warrior considered his options. He had no time for CR.
> This bot was critical by now. Operating alone was out of question,
> since he had no knowledge of such things. He had to wait.
> 
> He laid Kitkat on the table and went looking for pain-killers, 
drugs,
> energon catheter, anything that could help her.
> 
> All the while, he couldn't help thinking she was gorgeous...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She howled out in agony. Her wolf legs kicked out and then 
retracted. 
> > She arched her back and tossed her head back and 
> > forth. "Kill....me..AHHHHHHHHH! No...more.....Pain....AHHHHHHH!"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang hurried to get inside the base and went straight to 
the 
> > med bay.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Hang in there, we'll do our best to save you.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > Camoflage::
> > > > 
> > > > "Right! I'll go get Kenzo."  with that, she darted off 
towards 
> > the 
> > > > base.  As she went, sh yelled "KENZO! KENZO! KENZO!" every 
twenty 
> > > > feet or so untill she got to the base.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > She groaned as she was picked up. Her body was limp as she 
had no 
> > > > energy left to resist. She opened her optics slightly, and 
out of 
> > the 
> > > > corner of her optic, she could see a male bot figure picking 
her 
> > up.  
> > > > She couldn't tell who it was. But her wolf nose told her that 
it 
> > was 
> > > > another wolf bot. She was about to try to talk when a surge 
of 
> > pain 
> > > > ran through her belly. She threw her head back and arched her 
> > back in 
> > > > writhing agony. "AAAHHHHHHHHH!" screaming out in anguish.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > > The Maximal wolf looked at his Predacon opponent. He 
frowned 
> > but 
> > > > made
> > > > > no sign of outward defiance.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Blackfang: We will intervene quickly and bring her back to 
you 
> > fully
> > > > > functional. In exchange, you must not leave the area or 
cause 
> > > > trouble.
> > > > > You know that an accident happens much too fast in 
surgeries...
> > > > > 
> > > > > With that, he transformed and took Kitkat in his arms, 
being 
> > careful
> > > > > not to touch her where internal leaks were obvious.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Blackfang: Cam, head back to base now and warn Kenzo he's 
> > needed 
> > > > right
> > > > > away to help this bot. Go!
